title: Strengthening Labor Union Leadership Competencies in the Fourth Industrial Revolution

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A practical leadership development program to address workplace challenges arising from technological changes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three impacts of Fourth Industrial Revolution technologies on labor union operations.
Learners can analyze labor-management conflict cases during digital transformation and develop negotiation strategies.
Learners can design labor union education programs using a fieldwork-based organizational learning model.
Learners can propose at least two reskilling strategies for workers when introducing smart factories.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
